description.gold-silver:
Restores HP by 1/2
the max HP.
description.crystal:
Restores HP by 1/2
the max HP.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Recovers up to half the
user’s maximum HP.
description.emerald:
Recovers up to half the
user’s maximum HP.

that restores HP by
up to half of the
user’s maximum HP.

The user restores its
own HP by up to half
of its max HP.
